QuestData.Title: Getting Gladiators
QuestData.Description: When we fled Stonemaul, we had to leave others behind.$b$bIf we try to rescue them and are recognized, the ogres will know our purpose, and the first thing they will do is kill our friends.$b$bThe ogres do not know you, which might give you a fighting chance.$b$bEnter Stonemaul, find the other gladiators, and release them from their bonds. Do this and you will have our loyalty.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue gladiators Bruto, Y'kish, and Pitfighter Vaandaam.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, strange one. Now we are free to split that chieftain Kor'gall wide open!
